message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'd love. I'm asking for $100 for it. Let me know what you think!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Hey Bob, thanks for your offer!  I appreciate your interest. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $90 is the lowest I can go.  What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm really interested in making a deal, but I have to stay within my budget.
